text:
It makes writing and exposing ABIs incredibly nice. It really is a language you could learn in an afternoon, be productive in a few days time.

Also, writing C is fun. Writing C++ is like sharpening a knife to stab yourself in the eye with. 

Zig is an incredibly balanced medium — with an excellent build system (written in Zig), an expressive compile time partial evaluation system, and painless C/C++ interop.
